name: Zompy Jumpy - Zombie Jump
description:
Zip up your tracksuit and see how long you can survive by jumping over a hoard of dancing zombies. Eat a granola bar to regain health. Jump & double jump to avoid zombies. Simple yet challenging gameplay.

√ Retro graphics

√ Retro audio

√ Dancing zombies

√ Colorful tracksuits

√ User friendly simple controls

√ Game Center leaderboard


8-Bit Avrin Apps
